text: Don't bother. Ordered on grab and after 1 hour still in kitchen up till close, did not receive my order. Waste my time. Got the nerve to ask if i can change something on my order and i agreed. In the end i had to cancel because i find that delaying after the shop close is a dick move by the staff. Don't support this kind of unethical business practice. Never gonna support this business again.
The staff were rude and displayed a bad attitude. The lack of basic courtesy was surprisingly overwhelming. No matter how good the Pizzas, today's buying experience definitely affect our appetite.

The staff took my cash and didn't bother giving me back my change until i mention. How to forget? $13.90 i gave $20. Basic maths would tell you there will be some sort of change. Tf? Then finally counted the change and when pass back to me, dropped my change. Then money just get stepped over by a bunch of people. Please train your staffs properly.

Update : i order 4 wings. Paid for 4 wing but only gave me 2.
